eventDecorators.name: CrowdProposalCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when supply rate for `target` is set to `rate`.

functionDecorators.name: compStakeAmount
functionDecorators.description: Minimum Comp tokens required to create a crowd proposal.

functionDecorators.name: createCrowdProposal
functionDecorators.description: Create a new crowd proposalCall `Comp.approve(factory_address, compStakeAmount)` before calling this method.

parameterDecorators.name: targets
parameterDecorators.description: The ordered list of target addresses for calls to be made.

parameterDecorators.name: values
parameterDecorators.description: The ordered list of values (i.e. msg.value) to be passed to the calls to be made.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: The ordered list of function signatures to be called.

parameterDecorators.name: calldatas
parameterDecorators.description: The ordered list of calldata to be passed to each call.

parameterDecorators.name: description
parameterDecorators.description: The block at which voting begins: holders must delegate their votes prior to this block.
